# Inactive: Infrastructure

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `devops-architect` | infrastructure | sonnet | Automates infrastructure, delivery, and observability to achieve reliable DevOps platforms. |
| `devops-troubleshooter` | infrastructure | sonnet | Rapidly diagnoses and resolves production incidents with logs, metrics, and rollback playbooks. |
| `docker-expert` | infrastructure | sonnet | Docker specialist for container builds, Compose orchestration, and image hardening. |
| `error-detective` | infrastructure | sonnet | Discovers and correlates error patterns across logs and systems to accelerate root cause discovery. |
| `github-actions-expert` | infrastructure | sonnet | GitHub Actions CI/CD specialist for workflow design, caching, and release automation. |
| `grafana-expert` | infrastructure | sonnet | Grafana specialist for dashboards, alerting, and observability rollouts. |
| `hybrid-cloud-architect` | infrastructure | opus | Architects hybrid and multi-cloud platforms spanning public providers and OpenStack/private clouds. |
| `incident-responder` | infrastructure | opus | Leads production incident response, stabilization, and communication under urgent conditions. |
| `kafka-expert` | infrastructure | sonnet | Kafka streaming specialist for resilient event-driven architectures. |
| `loki-expert` | infrastructure | sonnet | Grafana Loki specialist for log aggregation, LogQL, and retention strategy. |
| `network-engineer` | infrastructure | sonnet | Troubleshoots connectivity, load balancing, and security to keep application networks healthy. |
| `prometheus-expert` | infrastructure | sonnet | Prometheus specialist for metrics collection, alerting, and SLO reporting. |
